text: (Or (why is not) a treasure thrown down unto him) for him to use, (or why hath he not a Paradise) a garden (from whence to eat) and be full? (And the evil-doers) the idolaters: Abu Jahl, al-Nadr and Umayyah and their hosts (say: Ye are but following a man) Muhammad (bewitched) who is possessed and mad.
